interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Queendom Unlashed Mascara | Volumizing and Lengthening | Boosts Lash Length | Vegan, Cruelty Free, Paraben Free
Review Date: 2020/03/09
Store: Queendom
Average Rating: 3.3
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '5.28 x 0.94 x 0.63 inches; 0.85 Ounces'}
Review Text: This mascara provides volume and length, but at a clumpy price. The wand is great for separation of each lash which helps evenly apply the formula to each lash. The formula goes on kind of clumpy as shown by other reviewers and flakes with wear. I had to wipe the fallout twice which would be terrible if I were wearing full coverage foundation. It does, however, remove easy with facial wipes.
Review Title: Volumizing at a Cost
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Bath Roman Japanese Cypress (Hinoki) Bath Salts - 680g
EARTH
['Japanese Bathsalt Bathroman cypress bath']
{'Brand': 'EARTH', 'Unit Count': '680 gram', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Item Weight': '1.8 Pounds', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '6.1 x 4.6 x 3.4 inches; 1.76 Pounds', 'Item model number': '4901080536013', 'Manufacturer': 'Bathroman'}
I enjoy woodsy, earthy scents so this was a great choice. This hinoki smells like evergreen, dry cedar, with a lemon-like undertone; the scent has a calming effect and lasts throughout your soak. You can splurge a little for these salts because you only need to use a small amount to get the full effect.
Sacred Hinoki - Calming, Grounding Scent
ITECHNIK Sonic Rechargeable Electric Toothbrush for Adults, with TPU Wrapped Handle, Inductive Fast Charge, 5 Brushing Modes, Waterproof, Smart Timer, 3 Replacement Heads&Covers, ST-102 (Black)
ITECHNIK
{'Product Dimensions': '7.87 x 3.94 x 1.97 inches; 0.01 Ounces', 'UPC': '779186943264'}
The top settings are very strong and get your teeth clean. The lowest setting however are perfect for sensitive teeth. Unit charges really fast and can be plugged into a laptop or phone charger for travel. I also like the fact that the charger is a little more present than some others, so you can find it more easier. I had one with just a cable and the cable got tossed. The faux leather on the back fits well into any size hands.
Fast and Functional
Queendom Unlashed Mascara | Volumizing and Lengthening | Boosts Lash Length | Vegan, Cruelty Free, Paraben Free
Queendom

This mascara provides volume and length, but at a clumpy price. The wand is great for separation of each lash which helps evenly apply the formula to each lash. The formula goes on kind of clumpy as shown by other reviewers and flakes with wear. I had to wipe the fallout twice which would be terrible if I were wearing full coverage foundation. It does, however, remove easy with facial wipes.
Volumizing at a Cost
profile:
**User Preferences Summary:**

- **Fragrance Preferences**: Enjoys woodsy and earthy scents, particularly those reminiscent of nature, like cedar and evergreen, with citrus undertones linked to calming effects.

- **Product Types**: Prefers natural bath products, particularly bath salts, that enhance the bathing experience through unique aromatic profiles. Has shown interest in personal care products that enhance daily hygiene routines with functional benefits.

- **User Experience**: Values high-quality products that provide strong sensory experiences and lasting effects, indicating a preference for premium options in both bath and personal care categories.

- **Cosmetic Preferences**: Recently explored cosmetics, focusing on volumizing and lengthening options. However, tends to prioritize quality and performance, as feedback reflects a balanced view on efficacy versus usability, especially regarding application and wear.

- **Sensory Effects**: Seeks calming and grounding experiences through the use of bath products, aligning with a preference for relaxation and stress relief. Also values functionality and efficiency in personal care tools, suggesting an interest in devices that enhance overall well-being while being user-friendly.

- **Usage Pattern**: Appreciates products that require small amounts for maximum benefit, reflecting a conscientious approach to consumption. This extends to personal care items, including cosmetics, seeking versatile features suitable for varying needs.

Overall, the user values sensory-rich and calming experiences, with growing interest in high-quality personal care products, both in cosmetics and bathing, that combine functionality with relaxation, indicating a holistic approach to self-care.
